thread.title: Manchester United team vs Chelsea revealed as Marcus Rashford STARTS for Red Devils
thread.title_full: Manchester United team vs Chelsea revealed as Marcus Rashford STARTS for Red Devils

author: Liam Prenderville
title: Manchester United team vs Chelsea revealed as Marcus Rashford STARTS for Red Devils
text:
Sport Manchester United team vs Chelsea revealed as Marcus Rashford STARTS for Red Devils The England striker had been ill and didn't travel with the rest of the squad but has been passed fit Share Jose Mourinho gives instructions to Marcus Rashford (Photo: Richard Heathcote) Share Get football     
Marcus Rashford STARTS for Manchester United against Chelsea in the FA Cup. 
The England striker had been ill and didn't travel with the rest of the squad. 
But he has been passed fit to start amid a striker crisis. 
Zlatan Ibrahimovic is suspended for the Red Devils while Wayne Rooney and Anthony Martial are both injured. 
Chelsea meanwhile have recalled Nemanja Matic and Willian to their starting line-up. Teams 
Chelsea: Courtois, Azpilicueta, Cahill, Luiz, Moses, Kante, Matic, Alonso, Willian, Hazard, Costa 
Subs: 
Manchester United: De Gea, Valencia, Jones, Smalling, Rojo, Darmian, Herrera, Pogba, Young, Mkhitaryan, Rashford 
Subs: Romero, Bailly, Blind, Carrick, Fellaini, Lingard, Mata. poll loading Will Manchester United beat Chelsea? 1000+ VOTES SO FAR
